sections.heading: Questions: LIKE? & WHAT-KIND?
sections.body:
**YOU LIKE MUSIC?** (Y/N face) ‚Üí **YES / NO.**  
**MUSIC WHAT-KIND?** (WH-face) ‚Üí **ROCK / POP / JAZZ / CLASSICAL** (fingerspell or sign type if taught).

sections.heading: Partner Practice: Weekend Plans
sections.body: A: **WEEKEND YOU DO-DO?**  B: **I PLAY GAME.**  A: **WHAT-KIND?**  B: **PUZZLE / VIDEO / CARD.**  A: **WHY?**  B: **BECAUSE RELAX.** Switch roles; keep answers compact.

callouts.title: Feedback Stem
callouts.body: ‚ÄúGood! Try **time-first** + tiny pause; WH-face stronger on WHAT-KIND.‚Äù

sections.body: Record **10‚Äì15s**: time-first + hobby + one follow-up. Example: **AFTER SCHOOL I WATCH MOVIE. MOVIE WHAT-KIND? ‚Üí ACTION.**
sections.teacherNote: Privacy submissions OK; caption should state your **WHAT-KIND** answer.
